mention.text: gigante , the powerful mafioso who avoided jail for decades by wandering the streets in a ratty bathrobe and slippers
gigante , a stocky figure with a pugilist 's face and 1940s pompadour
a spokeswoman for the fbi , the organization that worked for years to put him behind bars
the `` oddfather '' for his bizarre behavior
a quarter - century of public craziness
an april 2003 federal hearing in which he calmly pleaded guilty to obstruction of justice
the man described by the new york times magazine as `` the last great mafioso of the century
the final act in a 50 - year career linking the era of old - time gangsters and the modern - day mafia of gotti
the crime family founded in 1931 by legendary gangster charles
the hitman in a botched attempt to assassinate then - boss frank costello
